entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain late this evening and ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 9:09 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:09 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
